content:
I think I'll start by creating folders and filters to sort my emails, and then focus on deleting or archiving emails that are no longer relevant. I also like the idea of batching similar emails together and using the "2-Minute Rule" to deal with quick tasks. One thing I'm worried about is keeping my inbox organized in the long term. Do you have any suggestions on how to maintain my newly organized inbox?
(Please respond as the assistant)
